details: Managed two projects simultaneously, leveraging both Angular and React technologies.
Crafted visually engaging and user-friendly website screens, boosting user interaction and engagement by 15%.
Developed and maintained a SharePoint portal, improving client engagement by 40%.
Led training and created documentation, boosting onboarding efficiency by 30% and ensuring coding best practices.
Developed responsive Angular web applications, increasing user retention by 25%.
Led the implementation of 3+ essential UI features using Micro-Frontend Architecture to improve user experience.
Optimized 10+ packages, ensuring adherence to SOLID and DRY principles for clean and efficient code, increasing code quality by 30%.
Specialized in API integration, enhancing front-end to back-end data communication for optimal performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve critical issues, improving system stability.
Developed a Student Management System using Springboot Application and MySql with all the CRUD functionalities and connected with other services using the Eureka server.
Later the project is deployed in Docker as a Container and then in GCP, it is deployed in Kubernetes.
Technologies used: Java, Springboot, MySql, Docker, Kubernetes, GCP.
